img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(1\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7c/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%281%29.png)
He uses a huge axe, so most of his attacks are slow swings. The main approach to this fight should be to dodge the slow attacks, then immediately follow up with a combo as he takes time to recover.
img_below_text:
Occasionally, he will kick at you or jump up in the air, raising his axe above him. When he does the latter, he will slam it down as he lands, but even with this move, dodging is still the way to go.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2822%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:

He uses a huge axe, so most of his attacks are slow swings. The main approach to this fight should be to dodge the slow attacks, then immediately follow up with a combo as he takes time to recover."
            - Following Text: "Occasionally, he will kick at you or jump up in the air, raising his axe above him. When he does the latter, he will slam it down as he lands, but even with this move, dodging is still the way to go.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2822%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic moment in a battle within a dark, eerie landscape. A formidable enemy wielding a massive, fiery axe is preparing to execute a powerful slam attack. The surrounding environment is desolate, with barren trees and remnants of ancient structures, enhancing the intense atmosphere of the confrontation. This image serves to illustrate a key strategy in the game, emphasizing the importance of dodging the enemy's slow but devastating attacks to gain an advantage in combat.
